jobs.title: Technology Risk Intern
description: Conducted research and prepared reports on bank technology, digital payments, and cybersecurity emerging risks
Assisted in conducting IT, payments, and cybersecurity examinations of banks and/or service providers
Reviewed bank or service provider examination reports
Participated in supervisory and risk meetings and related organizational functions
Supported department management on special projects and other time-sensitive assignments

jobs.title: Quality Assurance Inspector
description: Worked in a manufacturing facility that produces world class precision injection molding and assembly
Documented quality control for products that serve the medical, pharmaceutical, packaging, and industrial markets
Assured products met business fulfillment requirements for customers
Applied consistent & robust processes that improve quality of products and speed to market

projects.title: Kick Covid in the _____.
projects.description: This is a COVID-19 Research Article Search Engine written in C++ and built using CMAKE that utilizes a self-implemented AVLTree for word storage and self-implemented HashTable for author storage. The documents are ranked by the term-frequency/inverse document frequency (tf/idf) metric and indexed with a command line user interface. After indexing, a user can enter a search query with multiple keywords and view statistics of the index.

projects.title: Web3.py Eth Wallet Operator
projects.description: This application connects a user to the Ethereum blockchain where they can view the ETH balance of any wallet address and send ETH transactions using their own wallet.

projects.title: Flight Planner
projects.description: This program determines all possible flight plans for a person wishing to travel between two different cities while accounting for time and costs. To perform an exhaustive search of all possible flights originating from a particular city, this program implements an iterative backtracking algorithm. This program utilizes the following self-implemented data structures: String, Stack, Linked List, and Adjacency List.
